sentences.sContent: This is an earnest and decorous book.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is an earnest and decorous book.
sentences.sCn: 这是一本严肃高雅的书。

sentences.sContent: Real wood door gives a person with sedate, decorous feeling.
sentences.sContent_eng: Real wood door gives a person with sedate, decorous feeling.
sentences.sCn: 实木门给人以稳重、高雅的感觉。

synos.tran: 有礼貌的，高雅的；端正的

remMethod.val: decor(n. 装饰布局) + ous → 经过装饰的 → 合宜的， 高雅的

words.tran: 礼仪；礼貌；端正；恪守礼仪
